attributes.action: Stop automatic Benefit payments or handouts to none UK residents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK appears to be coming a magnet for anyone wanting free handouts. It appears that to the rest of the world our pavements are indeed paved with gold.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Benefit-Sham/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
